root: ^I think today is a pretty good day.
^That's the best kind of day. What makes it so good?
^Well, the sun's out, and so are the clouds. It's warm but it's not hot.
^There's people here but it's not too crowded, so there aren't too many messes.
^That Bethany kid thought my magic trick was fun... I think. She sort of ran off to the roller coaster right after.
^But all the guests have been nice to me, too. And they seem to be having a nice time.
^Maybe my pay isn't great, maybe my boss seems tired nowadays, maybe this job isn't sustainable.
^But right now I feel good just ignoring those things and enjoying where I'm at.
^I'm happy to hear that... Was that for the news article?
^No. Well, sure, you can use it. But it was for you.
^Yes, you. You've been looking more tired since this morning. And I know that work can be stressful sometimes, but I want you to know that it's okay to stop and breath.
^Just enjoy where you are, take in the atmosphere. It's nice here, isn't it?
^Yeah, sure. But I don't know how much I can enjoy it. Things have been weird here.

s: ^I've just been feeling a little sick.

Choice1: ^Here, just in a different universe, I think. It feels like the whole world split in two.
^Everyone here is happy, but you're all grieving on the other side.
^That's a whole lot to take in. I tend not to believe in the paranormal, but it's still awfully scary.
Choice2: ^Yeah, that happens when people eat the prezels.
